oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Delineatio regionis Bassora cum pagis fluminibus et insulis, quæ christiani sancti Ioannis incolunt
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Dapper, Olfert , 1635 or 1636-1689
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Covers a portion of southeastern Iraq where the Euphrates and the Tigris Rivers converge.

From: Naukeurige beschryving van Asie: behelsende de gewesten van Mesopotamie, Babylonie, Assyrie, Anatolie, of Klein Asie: beneffens eene volkome beschrijving van gansch gelukkigh, woest, en petreesch of steenigh Arabie / Olfert Dapper. 1680.
Oriented with North toward the left.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Scale not given.
Iraq
